data.text: Fweny mag Obadia.
“To neuru, abiro miyo udok matin e kind ogendini,
Sunga manie chunyu osewuondou,
To kata obedo ni unyalo fuyo malo mabor ka ongo,
“Ka jokwoge obironu,
To mano kaka Esau ibiro choko gigene
Ogendini ma uriworugo biro sembou nyaka giko mar tongʼ;
Jehova Nyasaye wacho niya,
Jolweny magi, yaye Teman,
Nikech lweny mane utimone owadu Jakobo
Chiengʼ mane ichungʼ tenge
Ne ok onego ungʼigi kod achaya
Ne ok onego udonj e dhorangeye mag joga
Ne ok onego uchungʼ e akek yore,
“Chiengʼ Jehova Nyasaye okayo machiegni
Mana kaka ne umer ewi goda maler
To ewi got mar Sayun tony nobedie,
Od Jakobo nobed mach
Jo-Negev nokaw
To oganda mar jo-Israel mane oter e twech e piny Kanaan,
Jores noidhi ewi got mar Sayun,
